Title: bar
Description: bar(x, min, max, width) draws a band with width proportional to (x - min) and equal to width characters when x = max.
x — Size to display.min, max — Integer constants. The value must fit in Int64.width — Constant, positive integer, can be fractional.
The band is drawn with accuracy to one eighth of a symbol.
Examples: SELECT    toHour(EventTime) AS h,    count() AS c,    bar(c, 0, 600000, 20) AS barFROM test.hitsGROUP BY hORDER BY h ASC
